author: Tom Perrotta
title: A Scary Thought at the French Open: Rafael Nadal Is More Efficient Than Ever
text:
Paris
Last month, after he won a clay tournament in Barcelona for the 11th time in his career, Rafael Nadal bit his trophy and mugged for the camera, a routine he does after every title. Later on, he jumped in a pool with some of the tournament’s ball boys and ball girls. And then Nadal did the unthinkable, something he never used to do: He didn’t play tennis for three days.
Nadal... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
